Put a card of a certain type from your draw pile in your hand. If your draw pile contains no card of that type, put a random card of that type from your discard pile to your hand.
Drain damage grants #yTemporary #yHP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Changes the damage type of your next hit.
Venom damage inflicts #yVenom equal to unblocked damage dealt. #yVenom is used to trigger powerful effects.
